all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Wherefore he that prayeth, whose spirit is contrite, the same is accepted of me if he obey mine ordinances.
Doctrine and Covenants 52:15
Quote of the Day
"I urge you to devote time each week—for the rest of your life—to increase your understanding of the Atonement of Jesus Christ."
Russell M. Nelson | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
